subject: Larghetto
text:
Grant me but a day, love, 
    But a day, 
Ere I give my heart, 
    My heart away, 
Ere I say the word 
    I'll ne'er unsay. 

Is it earnest with me? 
    Is it play? 
Did the world in arms 
    Cry to me, "Stay!" 
Not a moment then 
    Would I delay. 

Yet, for very love, 
    I say thee nay. 
Ere I give my heart, 
    My heart away, 
Grant me but a day, love, 
    But a day!
